'''Anecdotes''' are a type of [[Quest]] that players receive daily during certain [[Event]]s.

==Events==
During [[Travelers' Tales: Anthology Chapter]], there were 45 anecdotes with 19 characters across [[Mondstadt]], [[Liyue]], and [[Inazuma]].
